name: humanoid
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a machine or creature with the appearance and qualities of a human Compare
android

(of a machine or creature) with the appearance and qualities of a human: He had built the machine to appear humanoid. They are developing humanoid robots.
More examplesFewer examplesThe creatures were vaguely humanoid in shape.A giant humanoid figure stood in front of us.The character is often described as a tall thin humanoid creature
